articles.title: US Girl Punched By Father, Cried In Backseat Until Death As He Did Drugs - NDTV
articles.description: An American man thrashed his 5-year-old daughter to death and took her chopped body parts to the restaurant where he worked, prosecutors said.
articles.content:
Adam Montgomery stuffed his daughter's body in a tote bag that he carried to his workplace.
An American man thrashed his 5-year-old daughter to death and took her chopped body parts to the restauran… [+1844 chars]
